chunks.content: During this time, Beyoncé recorded a duet with Marc Nelson, an original member of Boyz II Men, on the song 'After All Is Said and Done' for the soundtrack to the 1999 film, The Best Man.

metadata.relevance_reason: This sentence directly answers the question by stating that Beyoncé recorded a song with Marc Nelson for the movie 'The Best Man'.
metadata.answer_contribution: Identifies the singer (Marc Nelson) with whom Beyoncé recorded a song for the specified movie.
